name: Custom ruleset
description: These rules must be respected by all the AL code written within the company.

rules.justification: Manifest property is required for AppSource submission. Not mandatory
The name of variables and parameters must be suffixed with the type or object name. Ok le best practices ma anche no
The ID range assigned to the extension must be within the allowed range. Not mandatory
The app.json file must specify an Azure Application Insights resource. Not mandatory
You must write a tooltip in the Tooltip property for all controls of type Action and Field that exist on page objects. Tooltip not mandatory
